sentences.english: The chief cabinet secretary, Takeo Kawamura, insisted Nakagawa had not been drunk.
sentences.chinese: 內閣官房長官武雄河村堅持稱中川沒有喝醉。

sentences.english: Japanese cabinet spokesman Takeo Kawamura did not agree.
sentences.chinese: 但日本內閣發言人武雄河村並不贊同這一說法。

sentences.english: Extraoral origin of small-hing state, shortage of the early Ming Dynasty to the north superoxide deserter living Kawamura.
sentences.chinese: 祖籍口外小興州，明初逃兵荒到北歧河村居住。

sentences.english: Mr Kawamura has also helped establish a local political party to fight for the tax cuts.
sentences.chinese: 河村還協助建立了一個地方政黨，爭取減稅改革。

sentences.english: Situated in Xiahe Village, which is 5 kilometres east of Lingtong County, Xi'an City.
sentences.chinese: 位於西安市臨潼縣東5公里的下河村。
